portfolio.name: VR Chemistry Laboratory
portfolio.description: A Virtual Reality application to assist students in their online chemistry learning.

portfolio.name: VeriTread-Client-Auditing-Solutions
portfolio.description: This project is to create solutions for the Online Freight Broker VeriTread. It will be used to pull the appropriate information from both potential client's and already registered client's information that have been updated via RMIS' APIs.

portfolio.name: Momentum
portfolio.description: Momentum is a fast-paced temple-run like game where you dodge obstacles on a track until you reach the end of the level. The goal is to be challenging while still being enjoyable.
